items.title: Microsoft Excel Data Analysis: Pivot Tables and Formulas
items.headline: Learn Data Analysis, Formulas, and Pivot Tables. Data Analysis in Microsoft Excel for Beginners and Intermediate users
objectives_summary: How to create Pivot Tables to quickly summarize data
How to use VLOOKUP and INDEX/MATCH to pull out specific info from large data sets
How to use basic math/statistical functions like SUM, AVERAGE, COUNTIFS, and more...

items.title: Microsoft Excel Beginners to Advanced, Data Analysis and VBA
items.headline: Master MS Excel - Excel Basics, Pivots, Excel Charts, Functions, VBA and Data Analysis - all in this one complete course
objectives_summary: Introduction to Excel worksheets, workbooks, and toolbar: Learn the basics of Excel and how to navigate a spreadsheet.
Cells, Ranges, Tables, Worksheet operations: Navigate the spreadsheet and begin to change the way cells, ranges, and tables look and function.
Intermediate Excel skills - Formatting cells and conditional formatting: Easily set rules and conditions for cells within the Excel worksheet, so you stay organized.

items.title: Optimization with Metaheuristics in Python
items.headline: Learn Simulated Annealing, Genetic Algorithm, Tabu Search, and Evolutionary Strategies, and Learn to Handle Constraints
objectives_summary: Learn the foundations of optimization
Understand metaheuristics such as Simulated Annealing, Genetic Algorithm, Tabu Search, and Evolutionary Strategies
Be able to code metaheuristics in Python

items.title: Data Science for Business | 6 Real-world Case Studies
items.headline: Solve 6 real Business Problems. Build Robust AI, DL and NLP models for Sales, Marketing, Operations, HR and PR projects.
objectives_summary: Develop an AI model to Reduce hiring and training costs of employees by predicting which employees might leave the company.
Develop Deep Learning model to automate and optimize the disease detection processes at a hospital.
Develop time series forecasting models to predict future product prices.
